meanings.sent1: She felt self-conscious about her boobs in the new swimsuit.
meanings.sent2: The baby was hungry, so the mother breastfed him using her boobs.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled coffee on her shirt, creating a funny pattern around her boobs.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak was covered in snow, resembling two giant boobs in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful portrait of a woman with strikingly detailed boobs.

meanings.sent1: Don't be a boobs and forget your keys again!

meanings.sent3: He tried to juggle eggs but ended up dropping them all - what a silly boobs!

meanings.sent5: The character in the movie was portrayed as a lovable, clumsy boobs.
